name.description: The name of the Bolt task or plan to run.

parameters.description: The task or plan parameters to use for this run.

modulePaths.description: A list of additional directories outside of the project directory to add to the Bolt module path.

installModules.description: Download and install modules listed in a `Puppetfile`.

transport.description: The default transport to use when connecting to the target nodes.

user.description: The username to use to connect.

password.description: The password to use to connect.

privateKey.description: The name of a key in the `credentials` setting to use as the default SSH private key.

run_as.description: The username to use to run the task/plan

useSSL.description: If using the WinRM transport, whether to use SSL to connect.

verifyHost.description: Whether to verify host integrity when connecting to remote nodes.

proxyJump.description: If using the SSH transport, a hostname or user@hostname to use as a bastion when connecting to nodes.

targets.description: The list of target nodes to connect to, either in the same format as Bolt expects (a comma-separated string), or as a list.

credentials.description: A map of sensitive credential file names to content encoded using Base64.

connection.description: A Relay SSH connection to use.

sshKey.description: The SSH key to use when cloning the git repository.

name.description: A directory name for the git clone.
